title: Mathematical Thinking Development for Organizational Learning and Knowledge Sharing

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics concepts (discrete math, statistics) and collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: Team-based mathematical problem-solving activities in a limited technology environment (smartphone-centric) to strengthen organizational learning and knowledge-sharing capabilities

learning_goals: Mathematically analyze knowledge-sharing pathways within organizations using network theory modeling
Propose solutions to improve knowledge flow efficiency by over 20% by applying graph theory during collaborative problem-solving
Develop a mathematical model explaining collective intelligence formation mechanisms through project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
